noun.description: Abundance, plenty. Also as a count noun: a large quantity.

adjective.description: Abundant, plentiful; well-supplied; full (of or with something).

origin: Late 17th century; earliest use found in William Cleland (?1661–1689), army officer and poet. Origin unknown<br>late 18th century; earliest use found in Robert Fergusson (1750–1774), poet. From rowth.
